document.full_text: president goodluck jonathan secured election victory on sunday as votes were tallied from around nigeria, fuelling anger in the mainly-muslim strongholds of rival muhammadu buhari.
document.title: nigeria's jonathan sure of victory in election
lines_and_colors: president goodluck jonathan secured election victory on sunday as votes were tallied from around nigeria, fuelling anger in the mainly-muslim strongholds of rival muhammadu buhari.
